Installation
------------

	 `npm install bit.ly`


Usage
-----
    var BitLy = require('bit.ly');
    var bl = new BitLy('<username>', '<yourapikey>');
	    

	bl.shorten('http://google.com',function(err,res){ 
		console.log(res);  
	});


	bl.expand('http://bit.ly/1MhhTRk',function(err,res){
		console.log(res);
	});
